abstract: Tarsem Singh’s latest film Immortals, which explores a new interpretation of Greek mythology, uses 3-D special effects to blend dramatic landscapes with aggressive action.
snippet: Tarsem Singh’s film “Immortals,” a new interpretation of Greek mythology, uses special effects to achieve some particularly blood-spattered action scenes.
lead_paragraph: Tarsem Singh’s film “Immortals,” a new interpretation of Greek mythology, uses special effects to achieve some particularly blood-spattered action scenes.

headline.main: It’s Gods vs. Mortals, and It Isn’t Pretty
headline.seo: Heads are Exploding in Tarsem Singh’s ‘Immortals’
headline.print_headline: It’s Gods vs. Mortals, and It Isn’t Pretty
